segments.text: Good afternoon . Which service do you require .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to increase the amount of my L / C . It's quite a new one ; I opened it 12 days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What you need to do is apply for an amendment on your existing L / C .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do I go about that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll need to fill in this application form and there is a charge of 30 US dollars for this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , you can take that from my account . I'll fill in the form now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Yes ... that's all in order . What we will do now is send the L / C amendment to the negotiating bank . As soon as we know anything , we'll contact you .
segments.speaker: S1
